Just preordered mine on EB games Aus, $429 for an Xbox X is unheard of. Not to mention, a spanking limited edition based of a blockbuster game which also comes included with the first expansion pass. It #8217;s an insanely good deal. I know the Xbox Series X is just around the corner but I don #8217;t care! I #8217;ve learned not to buy consoles on launch, it #8217;s almost always a bad deal. Here is an expensive and an untested new product (so I #8217;m paying just to be a guinea pig) that #8217;s most likely going to have mountains of manufacturing issues, and few new games to play on it. No thanks! I will wait a few years before I even contemplate getting the Series X, by then it most likely have a revised new model - which is better on design, look and price not to mention tons of awesome games to play at a fraction of the original price. That #8217;s a win-win for me.

Yeah if this game tanks yet again. Thanks to the usual monumental incompetence of 343, then it might as well be time to hand the reigns to someone else. This studio has been around since what, 2008? And they #8217;re still bumbling around like amateurs. Obsidian has been with Xbox for just 2 years and they #8217;ve already done more for Xbox than this clowns ever did in over a decade. Yeah I #8217;m so done with 343 man. It #8217;s always disappointment after disappointment with them.
There #8217;s an article in that discussion. Have a look

Nah I don #8217;t trust third party studios. They #8217;ll just see this as another project to milk. This is why Microsoft bought all these studios, they realised the old strategy which is relying on third party studios was nothing but a cash grab for them as they didn #8217;t put a lot of love into these games and it shows. I think Microsoft should move 343 to their own project. I see a lot of similarities in their situation with Sony #8217;s Gorilla games. These guys for over a decade could never pull of the Killzone franchise, which was supposed to be Sony #8217;s answer to Halo. Until they decided to move to something and found their niche which was the 3rd person adventure game we now know as Horizon zero Down. So yeah who knows
Lol you don #8217;t know about the ten studios Microsoft bought 2 years ago?

That #8217;s right, and the reason Microsoft heavily relied (and failed I might add) on third party studios this generation is because of their lack of first party studios. Something had to change Over-reliance on an outside entity is usually a very bad strategy for any business long term, it #8217;s usually overburdened with costs and inefficiencies. One example, I always like to use is how Gearbox ripped off Sega with Aliens colonial marines. While Sega funded the game in good honest trust, Gearbox took that money and spent it on other projects they were making. This is why I #8217;m always very skeptical of third party studios...

What are these exclusives you #8217;re talking about? Apart from Halo, Gears, Fable, Forza? Only western studios that were good and MS should #8217;ve bought was Remedy which made Alan Wake and maybe Bizarre creations which used to make Project Gotham series, but you could argue if it wasn #8217;t for their demise then Forza would never have been made

It #8217;s funny how no one is even talking about these games. Before the Xbox showcase, all the idiots were like #8220;Xbox has no games #8221;. Then Microsoft shows them a variety of games and now they #8217;re talking about graphics... whatever

Yeah I have PS4 and XB one X as well, although I #8217;ve always been more of an Xbox guy and I only recently switched back to the Xbox this gen because of its 2013 launch mess. Thanks Don Mattrick But I #8217;m starting to see something that many Xbox fans have been saying for years, there #8217;s a genuine anti Xbox bias in the gaming community today. Whatever it does it #8217;s never good enough and it #8217;s just cool to be hating on Xbox now days. This showcase proved to me beyond any more doubt. The amount of toxicity from social media and youtubers/influencers is a massive wake up call for me.

#8216;Niche #8217; gamepass fodder? These are AAA games. Yep this exactly what I was talking about, the #8220;never good enough crowd #8221;... yeah I don #8217;t care what you think. See ya #128075; #127998;

Well this is the year that Xbox has officially shitted on that notion. But the hypocrites will keep saying the same thing or move the goal post to something else like #8220;graphics #8221; of a certain unreleased game, like they #8217;re doing right now. Your advice about just ignoring them is wise as I #8217;ve been doing that the last few days. I just roll my eyes and move on

The announcement of Fable was HUGE. Not to mention Avowed as well, which could be a system seller for console gamers. Never mind the announcement of STALKER 2 which for me was a #8220;mic drop #8221; moment as this game is HUGE in its own right. Do we hear anything about this? Nope, in fact it #8217;s zero, zip, zilch. Let #8217;s instead focus on minor graphics details, whatever. The gameplay was very impressive, the art style was also very encouraging as 343 seemed to have abandoned their misguided art direction in the last two Halos and adopting the old Halo art style. Which was in my opinion was never realistic but stylised look to it.

I think Hellblade 2 will be amazing. Ninja Theory is an amazingly talented team, with a budget behind them. I think Hellblade will be like a Horizon zero Dawn type of open world game, I expect to see gameplay maybe next years E3 (if there #8217;s even one) and probably be released by end of 2021/early 2022. I #8217;m also very excited what the new Initiative team has got in the works, I have no idea what it is but if it #8217;s Perfect Dark. I think I #8217;m going to pass out. Avowed also looks extremely intriguing, I have full faith in Obsidian as Obsidian with a budget behind them can do almost anything. Although we won #8217;t get hands on this since development started early 2019 (maybe a little before that) I expect release date to be somewhere in 2022, maybe at latest 2023. So yeah lots of games to be exited about. As well new MS studio acquisition rounds, my money is on Asobo studios which made the awesome Plague #8217;s Tale and are now making Flight simulator (which I don #8217;t know if you #8217;ve seen it, looks quite simply unbelievable) coming out on PC and Xbox at a later date. Exciting times ahead!
lol, this is complete BS take.

WRITING.TITLE: What #8217;s going on with Killer Instinct #8217;s achievements?
WRITING.TEXT: I #8217;ve had this game for over a year, loved it to bits and only started playing it again after a long hiatus. Sadly, as it was the same case back then. The achievements are almost all very rare. This is a great fighting game, in fact one of the best I played but it saddens me deeply that nobody is playing it. What the hell is going on? If Microsoft pulls the plug on this franchise thanks to the lack of engagement and indifference towards this game then I won #8217;t be surprised. It feels like Alan Wake all over again another great game let down by gamers.

Yeah, I didn #8217;t know had that many achievements but still, these #8216;achievements #8217; I #8217;m getting are very basic. I #8217;m getting achievements for just trying out with a different fighter. Fighting with Kilgore for the first time, the achievement for this is as low as only 3.14% of gamers unlocking this? Really? Come on.

Even worse is just sparring with general RAAM #8217;s which I assume is very popular in the Xbox community due to Gears franchise, this is achievement is as low as 3.01%? I #8217;m sorry but this is terrible. What a way to celebrate such an iconic character and villain.

Yeah this looks great, it #8217;s already getting a ton of good feedback. Hopefully this becomes another massive success for Microsoft, it #8217;s off to a great start already in being the #1 seller on steam
The whole Xbox social media team are amazing. Especially the ones that run the gamepass account on Twitter. They #8217;re chefs kiss #128536;

I actually got a free game after I refunded it. Don #8217;t know why but they somehow forgot to disable my licence. Of course I called them back because otherwise I would be a thief and they did me a solid in the first place but after a while, they #8217;re like #8220;we can #8217;t do anything to change that, so you got a free game #8221;... I wish I could pay for it but hey it #8217;s not my fault. FYI that game was Resident evil 7.

Yeah that #8217;s why I #8217;m conflicted here #128528;

WRITING.TITLE: Microsoft #8217;s WB Games acquisition in trouble.

Current market valuation is around 4 billion US dollars. I just don #8217;t see Microsoft (even with its deep pockets) making two big acquisitions in the space of few months. WRITING.TEXT: I tell this damn website that I #8217;m not interested in mums. What does it do? Keeps recommending me all these mums. Wow, thank you so much!

I actually paid for it, so shut the hell up and get lost.
So it #8217;s okay to stare at every woman I see because I #8217;m sometimes become weak and falter? Come on. You left your logic at the door.

Feminism encourages women to dress immodestly. Hence the problem of dressing in a overtly sexual way like yoga pants, short shorts. If you think this is okay? Then you need to go a madrasa and learn the basics of Islam. You think Islam is okay for women to show everything? Get a reality check mate.

So criticising and avoiding to look at overtly sexual dressed women like yoga pants, short shorts, etc makes me a hateful mysogynist? Way to twist and turn a motivational post into something else. Everyone can see these post, you #8217;ve even alerted the moderating bots for insults. Judging by the post, they can all see who #8217;s the one being irrational.

Well just don #8217;t make sweeping statements about something you know little about. I paid for this website and unlike what you said, I #8217;m not getting for what I paid. Like honouring my preferences. I #8217;d tell you again to get lost.

Women dress that way to gain attention. What else could they possibly do that for? What happens after you stare at them? I feed their egos. Brothers, go to my page and check my history for yourselves. Alhamdulillah I got nothing to hide, and Allah is my witness. WRITING.TITLE: So someone argued with me in this sub that women who dress immodestly, don #8217;t do it for male attention. Watch this video and tell me otherwise.

WRITING.TEXT: Bro there #8217;s a Hadith on this where the Prophet #8206; #65018; condemns women who are wearing clothes but are naked. They are categorically condemned, he does not make distinctions between them at all. It #8217;s to the point that I #8217;m now contemplating leaving the country I reside in now and relocating to a Muslim country. Somewhere far far away from this type of daily fitnah. I dread even going to the shopping mall these days because I know I will be bombarded from every angle. I also don #8217;t like how you #8217;re painting as some sort of a misogynist, when all I #8217;m doing is pointing out these fitnahs. Women are a fitnah for men, do you know that? There #8217;s a saheeh on this. And the fact is, feminism is corrupting these people even further when they are already disbelievers. In the 1950s women and girls used to wear long dresses, and they were just as fine without the need to wear yoga pants and short shorts. These are all excuses to dress immodestly to try to entice men, and the truth it #8217;s working. To the point of fooling even Muslims like you. I stand by what I said, I believe in it 100%. And I won #8217;t be backtracking it one bit because I know the truth is on my side. May Allah guide you and me, ameen.

Where did I generalise? Prophet #8206; #65018; condemns these women who will be naked but at the same time are wearing clothes. He does not say #8216;except the ones who are doing for themselves or for the weather #8221;, they are all condemned. So no, I #8217;m not generalising.
Yes, I can read the subtitles. So don #8217;t point that out
#8216;Inside the worlds toughest prisons #8217; on Netflix, it #8217;s pretty good if you can watch it.

Please brother/sister don #8217;t do it. I know things are very hard on your end but ending your life won #8217;t solve it. There #8217;s always hope, please don #8217;t lose it. There are people that love you I #8217;m sure, if you #8217;re not going to do it for yourself then do it for them. Jazak Allah, may Allah bless you abundantly and save you from further calamities. Ameen

Obviously I was talking about the urges I was having and not contemplating #8216;raping #8217; someone, wa iyadu billah. You guys can be very dense sometimes. I left this post here because I know there #8217;s nothing in it and got nothing to hide. Check the other comments, no one is saying such things except acknowledging that some particular days urges are very strong than some other days. Alhamdulilah, I know I #8217;m honest with Allah and myself and people like you can think whatever you want. So go ahead keep slandering me, see if I care.

My post only claimed that women who dress in provocative way are doing it for male attention. Is that wrong? No, some women who dress this way crave attention and so by that knowledge, I won #8217;t give them my attention. Is that misogyny? No. The mods can do whatever they want. They were overzealous, most of the comments agreed with me. So yeah, got nothing to regret. I say what I think and I don #8217;t care if it offends you or anybody else. Bye #128075; #127998;
